message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement today. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $18000. This price reflects its high quality and unique features. I hope you find it compelling enough to consider this offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. After reviewing your proposal, I would like to counteroffer at $17000 for the product. This price still reflects its high value, but I am open to discussing further if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I've taken into account your budget constraints while still valuing the product's worth. I am willing to consider $16500 as the final price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000 for the product.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $16250 as the final price for the product. This price reflects its value and I believe it offers a fair compromise for both parties. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000 for the product.

Thank you for your persistent efforts, Bob. I understand your position and have decided to accept $16125 as the final price for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between reflecting the product's value and accommodating your budget. I hope this satisfies your requirements.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the ongoing negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $16000 for the product.
